```{r}
c(FALSE, NA)
c(FALSE, NA_integer_)
c(FALSE, NA_complex_)
c(FALSE, NA_character_)
```

```{r}
fac = factor(c('a','b','c'))
is.numeric(fac)
setNames(fac, 1:3)
unname(fac)
```

```{r}
abc = 1:5
dim(abc)
NROW(abc)
NCOL(abc)
```

These are printed differently:
```{r}
array(1:5, c(5,1,1))
array(1:5, c(1,5,1))
array(1:5, c(1,1,5))
```

Commnent is not printed
```{r}
a = 1:5
structure(a, comment = 'wow')
comment(a) = 'wow'
comment(a)
```
```{r}
b = 5:9
tab = table(a,b)
str(tab)
class(tab)
typeof(tab)
is.array(tab)
dim(tab)
dimnames(tab)
```

When levels are reversed, the values are reversed too
```{r}
fac = factor(letters)
fac
levels(fac) = rev(levels(fac))
fac
```
